title: Good price, good location, nice staff, clean
text: Amazing place with kind, helpful staff. Clean rooms, nice vibe, good breakfast and great value for the price. Comfortable beds and nice rooms. I don’t think you can have it better in Tel Aviv if you like hostels.

title: Good fast food, reasonably priced
text: We loved the quick, cheap options. Quick eats, fresh and can be eaten on the go as well. Nice pita, fresh salad and quality meats

title: One fo the best thermal baths of Budapest
text: Great bath with a good variety of pools, hot, cold and plenty of saunas and steam rooms. My only complaint is the changing area...its a bit hectic

title: Quality Arabic food in the heart of Budapest
text: Absolutely amazing Arabic restaurant with an outstanding vibe. Perfect meal, atmosphere and service right by the Basilica of Budapest. We tried the Mixed Grill to have a variety of meats and some salad and humus. All incredible, fresh, and very tasty! I would definitely recommend this place for anyone to try!

title: Number one thing for Athens. Don’t miss it
text: Definitely the most important sight of all. I went during the day, not sure if you can go up there at night but definitely get to a place where you can see it light up also at night. Absolutely magnificent, full of history and glory

title: One of the musts in Athens
text: Epic sight in the heart of Athens that is a must. Unfortunately it is not included in the 30 eur pass you buy for all the other sites but it’s 5 euros well spent to go there and see it. Also had a small museum you shouldn’t miss

title: Rooftop pool
text: Awesome hotel with an amazing roof top pool and bar. Definitely one of the best views on Athens and the acropolis! I would say that’s a good reason to choose this hotel over any other. Over all good location, within walking distance from all important sites, just do remember you have to climb back up the hill to get back to the hotel.

title: Fresh quick authentic food
text: Loved how we could quickly grab some Croatian food here. Cheap, fresh, quick, quality food. Real close to center, so very convenient. 5star place

title: Excellent food, atmosphere, service
text: This is an amazing local place filled with great options of local dishes and fantastic service. Had one dinner there and decided to go back there for an other lunch because we loved it so much. Prices are also real good compared to the average in the city. Definitely recommending this place to everyone.

title: True Italian food with authentic experience
text:
Guys, for real. I don’t usually write a review but I was so amazed by the kindness and thoughtfulness of the staff at this restaurant that I just had to take my time to write a review.
1, the Manager (Simone) walks around making sure everyone is happy with a big smile. Love the attitude and care for his customers. True gentlemen!
2, staff the same
3, food, just simply amazing. I recommend the cacio e pepe we especially liked that in company of a spicy salami pizza. In addition, they have a nice selection of wines (the Chianti recommended to us is now a personal favorite).

This is not the typical touristy restaurant, this is the true Italian experience where you are welcomed and treated with special kindness. And the food is outstanding!

PS: You can easily watch soccer games at the restaurant and this definitely adds to the experience!

title: best asian fast food in town. no joke!
text: they make the food for you. so it is not the menza style when its already prepared and they heat it for you. it is quite frankly the best asian fast food in the city. fresh ingredients, great cooks, and nice people. only bad thing they got, the place is small. time to upgrade ;)

title: all around great airline, for the price
text: Great low cost airline, kind service, clean plane. the seats are a bit small, but hey, its a cheap flight :)

title: Original Italian
text: Great quality food with great prices. Loved the feel of this little place and how it wasnt the busy touristy style. Food was fresh, and tasty, i can not come up with a complaint i had during my time of visit. I would recommend it to my future mother in law :D
place: Il Priscio - Duomo - Panzerotteria con salumi

title: A day that i will never forget
text: My friends and me had a great time in Budapest with Andras. The hidden treasure is a truly memorable, and fun trip to partake in. I have been to Budapest before, its a beautiful city, but it has so many cool places that only locals would know, and not necessary in the "tour books". If you are looking for something truly adventures and unique i definitely recommend this trip. We have gone to an island on the Danube (via a tiny boat :) ), to hidden 300 years old mysterious libraries downtown Budapest. And we even got to see Budapest from the top of a roof. Real unique experience, truly fantastic trip. Andras speaks real good English, he is very polite, knowledgable, loves Budapest, and seems to have lots of joy from showing us all around. Reliable, prepared, and funny.
